text:
="preserve">Lily Lian (1 May 1917 – 24 May 2020) was a French singer. She was seen as one of the last street singers of Paris. She worked with Édith Piaf, Tino Rossi, Maurice Chevalier, and Yves Montand. For two years, she was the mistress of actor and music composer Vincent Scotto. Lian made many appearances on his show, titled "La Chance aux chansons".
Lian died on 24 May 2020 in Ivry-sur-Seine, France at the age of 103.
